DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess immunogenicity safety GSK Biologicals ' investigational measles , mumps , rubella varicella ( MMRV ) vaccine ( GSK208136 , PriorixTetra™ ) co-administered along conjugated Meningococcal C ( MenC ) vaccine ( Meningitec® , Nuron Biotechs ' Vaccine ) healthy child .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study PriorixTetra™ When Co-administered With Conjugated MenC Vaccine Healthy Children
